text_ruling:
Can the Corp advance [Urtica Cipher](/en/card/30044) if it’s unrezzed?
>Yes. Abilities that allow the Corp to advance a card are active even if the card is unrezzed.

Does [Urtica Cipher](/en/card/30044) do damage even if it has no advancement counters on it?
>Yes, as long as it is installed. The 2 damage indicated in the card text is not contingent on adding more damage for advancement counters.

Does [Urtica Cipher](/en/card/30044) do its damage all at once, or in increments?
>[Urtica Cipher](/en/card/30044)’s ability causes a single occurrence of damage, whether or not [Urtica Cipher](/en/card/30044) is advanced.
